features: 【Soft Area Rug】- Super soft and relatively thick, this shag rug can add cushion and decoration to your cold floor; Memory foam layer will give you some elasticity, soft to sit or lie on.
【Washable Rug】- machine wash and hand wash are both suitable; wrinkles and smells will disappear after a quick wash; rug will become flat and beautiful afetr wash as well;
【Modern Minimalist】- this solid area rug with gorgeous color can easily match with your colorful home decorations, suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, offices, nurseries, dorm or any other rooms.

【Wear Resistant】- This room rug is designed to withstand everyday wear that is kid approved and pet friendly. Perfect for both low and high traffic areas of your home such as the kitchen, entryway, kids room.
【Versatile Rug】- this rug can not only be used as a normal rug, but also can be used in studio, office, car or dog house, bring softness and warmth to your families and pets.

Production Details No Shedding Frabric Our memory foam rug has no furs so that you don't worry about fur shedding or sticking on feet or cloth. Easy to Clean Spot cleaning and regular vacuuming is recommended. Also you can use a carpet cleaner

How to remove these wrinkles and eliminate smells? As it was air sealed(vacuum packaged), creases can be eliminated after wash. The smell will disappear after a quick wash, hanging for dry overnight. Another way is to let it sit out for 48 hours for the wrinkles and smell to go away. Can this rug be washed by machine? The new carpet can be machine washed or hand washed without the use of carpet cleaners, and then tumble dry with low temperature or air dry, becoming smooth and beautiful after wash. What type of rooms suitable for placing this rug on？ Suitable for bedrooms, small offices, nurseries, kitchens or any other rooms thanks to its not so much thick and not fluffy. The color is gorgeous, easy to match with your colorful home decors. If I want to buy a bedroom rug, which size should I choose? 4 by 6 feet rug is great for bedroom no matter you place it on bedside or bed end. 2 by 6 feet rug is also perfect for bedside. This bedroom rug can add a little decoration to the cold floor. What material are these rug made from? This rug is super soft and relatively thick, made with premium faux wool fabric and memory foam medium layer that will bring you some elasticty and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice rug for the price
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I got this, I washed it and threw it in the dryer. It fluffed out and looks nice. It’s def the thinnest layer of memory foam so it’s not super padded like I thought it would be but for the price I am very happy with this purchase. It’s soft and thinly plush. Overall, I am happy with my purchase and would buy another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars What a joke
reviews.reviewText: This is not a rug. It’s a blanket. Not at all as advertised. Do not waste your money. Rip off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little utility rug
reviews.reviewText: Was an accurately sized, non-slip rug. Thin but that is what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It's a blanket with a pad.
reviews.reviewText: Soft fleece with a pad on the back. I don't see it lasting long bc it's so thin it can rip and wear down easily. It doesn't have any rubber either so it will slide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wash it and dry it before judging how awful it looks
reviews.reviewText: I sent back three rugs and kept the smaller one .but I rinsed and dried it to see if that would fluff out the rug and it did! I didn't know the rug would look much nicer because from the package it looked like a wrinkled blanket . I'm going toorder them again ... Sorry I sent them back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wish it was shag and thicker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels so soft & silky
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable material, easy to vacuum, good value
